attributes.action: We love our Scotish neighbours but we insist they hold another referendum now!
attributes.additional_details: Despite a national deficit of 9.7% and each Scot receiving a Dividened form Westminster of £1,400 compared to the rest of the U.K. Oil prices at an all time low. Its biggest customer being The rest of the U.K. If the Scottish truly believe their future lies with the EU they should leave immediately.
attributes.background: If Scotland think they'll be better off as part of the European Union rather than our own, then we insist that they have their referendum immediately. They can not be allowed to hold the threat over us. Go now or not at all. We know they'll do the right thing.
